review: My husband got this as way to stream movies from his PC in his mancave to our TV's in the family room and our bedroom.  It provides beautiful High Def pictures and movies.  As to the technical difficulty in getting this set up for all of uses (internet streaming, DVD-sourced movies, going to multiple sources, etc), he's still working it to make it do everything he wants.  I've asked if there's good documentation that he can use, but am not getting much response.  He's a typical guy who'd rather figure it out for himself rather than ask the instruction guide for directions.  So I cannot give a fair response about implementation.  Am basing the 5 stars on what I see on the screen and it's performing flawlessly so far.
